# peers(with:)

**Instance Method**

Returns a list of peers in the specified connection state.

## Declaration

```swift
func peers(with state: GKPeerConnectionState) -> [Any]!
```

## Parameters

- **state**: The connection state to search for. See [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKPeerConnectionState] for possible values.

## Return Value

An array of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSString] objects with a [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKSession/peerID] string for each peer visible to the session that is currently in the specified connection state. If there are no peers in the specified connection state, this method returns `nil`.

## Obtaining Information About Other Peers

- **displayName(forPeer:)**: Returns a user-readable name for a peer.

items.description: Returns a user-readable name for a peer.
